claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela  (  -LSB- mænˈdɛlə -RSB- 18 July 1918 -- 5 December 2013  )  was a South African anti-apartheid revolutionary , politician , and philanthropist , who served as President of South Africa from 1994 to 1999 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was the country 's first black head of state and the first elected in a fully representative democratic election .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His government focused on dismantling the legacy of apartheid by tackling institutionalised racism and fostering racial reconciliation .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ideologically an African nationalist and socialist , he served as President of the African National Congress  (  ANC  )  party from 1991 to 1997 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A Xhosa , Mandela was born in Mvezo to the Thembu royal family .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He studied law at the University of Fort Hare and the University of the Witwatersrand before working as a lawyer in Johannesburg .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: There he became involved in anti-colonial and African nationalist politics , joining the ANC in 1943 and co-founding its Youth League in 1944 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After the National Party 's white-only government established apartheid -- a system of racial segregation that privileged whites -- he and the ANC committed themselves to its overthrow .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mandela was appointed President of the ANC 's Transvaal branch , rising to prominence for his involvement in the 1952 Defiance Campaign and the 1955 Congress of the People .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was repeatedly arrested for seditious activities and was unsuccessfully prosecuted in the 1956 Treason Trial .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Influenced by Marxism , he secretly joined the banned South African Communist Party  (  SACP  )  .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although initially committed to non-violent protest , in association with the SACP he co-founded the militant Umkhonto we Sizwe in 1961 and led a sabotage campaign against the government .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1962 , he was arrested for conspiring to overthrow the state and sentenced to life imprisonment in the Rivonia Trial .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mandela served 27 years in prison , initially on Robben Island , and later in Pollsmoor Prison and Victor Verster Prison .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Amid growing domestic and international pressure , and with fears of a racial civil war , President F. W. de Klerk released him in 1990 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mandela and de Klerk negotiated an end to apartheid and organised the 1994 multiracial general election in which Mandela led the ANC to victory and became President .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Leading a broad coalition government which promulgated a new constitution , Mandela emphasised reconciliation between the country 's racial groups and created the Truth and Reconciliation Commission to investigate past human rights abuses .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Economically , Mandela 's administration retained its predecessor 's liberal framework despite his own socialist beliefs , also introducing measures to encourage land reform , combat poverty , and expand healthcare services .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Internationally , he acted as mediator in the Pan Am Flight 103 bombing trial and served as Secretary-General of the Non-Aligned Movement from 1998 to 1999 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He declined a second presidential term and in 1999 was succeeded by his deputy , Thabo Mbeki .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mandela became an elder statesman and focused on combating poverty and HIV/AIDS through the charitable Nelson Mandela Foundation .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mandela was a controversial figure for much of his life .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Although critics on the right denounced him as a communist terrorist and those on the radical left deemed him too eager to negotiate and reconcile with apartheid 's supporters , he gained international acclaim for his activism .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Widely regarded as an icon of democracy and social justice , he received more than 250 honours -- including the Nobel Peace Prize -- and became the subject of a cult of personality .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is held in deep respect within South Africa , where he is often referred to by his Xhosa clan name , Madiba , and described as the `` Father of the Nation '' .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: `` Nelson Mandela ''  (  known in some versions as `` Free Nelson Mandela ''  )  is a song written by British musician Jerry Dammers , and performed by band The Special A.K.A. -- with lead vocal by Stan Campbell -- released on the single `` Nelson Mandela '' / `` Break Down The Door '' in 1984 .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Nelson Mandela International Day  (  or Mandela Day  )  is an annual international day in honour of Nelson Mandela , celebrated each year on 18 July , Mandela 's birthday .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: To mark the first global celebration of Mandela Day on 18 July 2009 , Mandela 's 91st birthday , a series of educational , art exhibit , fund-raising and volunteer events leading up to a concert at Radio City Music Hall on 18 July were organised by the 46664 concerts and the Nelson Mandela Foundation .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mandela Day is not meant as a public holiday , but as a day to honour the legacy of Nelson Mandela , South Africa 's former President , and his values , through volunteering and community service .

claim: Nelson Mandela chose a different avenue for his life than activism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: On 27 April 2009 , the 46664 concerts and the Nelson Mandela Foundation invited the global community to join them in support of an official Mandela Day .
